column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Aside from the great food and drinks
column2: the service was excellent. Went with a friend and ended up waiting a little bit longer than usual for a service. Once they realized we had been waiting they went above and beyond to make it up to us. They were very attentive the rest of our visit
column4: and ended up compensating for our entire meal (which was delicious). The manager came up to talk with us and make sure everything was ok. I can tell this restaurant places importance on their guests and service. I would definitely visit again.
